questiontext.text:
This is an SQL syntax-highlighting test, therefore contains nonsensical SQL statements and random code snippets.



CREATE TABLE trial (
    begin int,
    second varchar(32),
    third char(12)
);

DROP TABLE;

UPDATE OR CREATE trigger {
    ON DELETE CASCADE;
}

SELECT *, count(second)
FROM trial
WHERE begin LIKE "alpha"
GROUP BY second;

int main(void) {
    cout << "Hello world" << endl;
    putchar('x');
    bool this = true;
}

import java.util.ArrayList;

public abstract class Demo {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
    System.out.println("running");
    while (true) {
        boolean True = true;
    }
}
